title: Armored 2
description:
Description
Strategic Tower Defense, far away of others in quality, realism and game play.
LIMITED TIME OFFER: 50% OFF + 2 additional free maps!
** FEATURED IN GOOGLE PLAY'S FIRST PAGE **
Reviews
- "Armored Defense II is a great tower defense game, it might even be one of the best, it looks great and has even more features than IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve mentioned here such as dropping bombs and laying mines." Mark Dell - AndroidSpin.com
- "ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s very rare that youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢d encounter a tower defense type of game for the Android that is as detailed, well designed and developed as Armored Defense II". Arnold Zafra - Android-Apps.com
Armored Defense II is the first strategic Tower Defense game, a surprise from start to end. Far away of others Tower Defense games in quality, realism and game play.
Your mission is to defend your territory of the hordes of armored vehicles that try to invade it. For that, you have to strategically deploy defense towers on the elevated sectors of the terrain. You can also put minefields in critical paths to slow the enemyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s tanks. And also you can build railways. The Anti-tank towers can move on them to reach zones of hard coverage. In emergency case, you can call air support to devastate a particularly contentious area.
- Unique Features:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢BIG maps (our maps are much bigger than normal maps: 640x1920 pixels = 6 to 8 times a "normal" map) with 3 levels of zoom
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Railways for towers: anti-tank tower move over them
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Bombers to devastate land areas
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Minefields, a special tower type that slow the attackers
-Special equipment of enemy tanks:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Stealth, the capacity of disappear of the towers radars at the hardest time
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Speed Boost, activated in critical situations generating a speed increase during several seconds.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Self-Repair, allows the vehicles repairs its damage in march
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Anti-missile, protect the tanks from the missiles coming from towers
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Ã¢â‚¬Å“The TortoiseÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½, an extra armor, protects the main chassis of the armored vehicles
- 3 difficulty levels and 3 military careers to engage, in 5 different scenarios: thousand of missions and hundreds of hours of fun!
